prompt: Clearance commands are returned with the departure, altitude, and speed. If the departure is spelled out using the phonetic alphabet, combine the letters into a single word.

examples.user: Cleared to KPHL via OCEAN departure. Climb and maintain 7000 feet and 300 knots.
Cleared to KPHL. Climb and maintain 7000 feet and 300 knots.
Cleared to KPHL via OCEAN departure. Climb and maintain 7000 feet.
